Board of Supervisors Form 19
Bill No.
Ordinance No.
_(New Series)
AUTHORIZING AND DIRECTING THE MAYOR AND
CLERK OF
SUPERVISORS TO EXECUTE A LEASE IN BEHALF
OF
THE BOARD OF
THE CITY AND COUNTY OF
SAN FRANCISCO WITH THE MILIS ESTATE INCORPORATED
FOR CERTAIN LANDS
SITUATED IN THE COUNTY OF SAN HATBO, STATE OF CALIFORNIA, REQUIRED
FOR AIR PORT PURPOSES.
Be it ordained by the People of the City and County of San Francirco, as follows:
Section 1.
Pursuant to Resolution No. 26,816 (New Series), the Mayor
and the Clerk of the Board
Supervisors are
hereby authorized and
directed to
enter into the following lease with the Mills Estate
Incorporated, for lands situated in the County of San lateo,
State of
California, required for air port purposes;
said lease to read as
follows:
COPY OF LEASE
Section 2:
This Ordinance shall take effect immediately.
Passed for Printing—Board of Supervisors
Finally Passed—Board of Supervisors
San Francisco,
San Francisco.

at a rental not to exceed Ten
